org.pinus4j.datalayer.query.jdbc

Class AbstractJdbcQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pinus4j.datalayer.query.jdbc.AbstractJdbcQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataQuery
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRecordIterator, GlobalJdbcMasterQueryImpl, GlobalJdbcQueryImpl, GlobalJdbcSlaveQueryImpl, ShardingJdbcMasterQueryImpl, ShardingJdbcQueryImpl, ShardingJdbcSlaveQueryImpl

    public abstract class AbstractJdbcQuery
extends Object
implements IDataQuery
    分库分表查询抽象类. 此类封装了分库分表查询的公共操作. 子类可以针对主库、从库实现相关的查询.
    Author:
    duanbn
